short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply select the phone number you want to dial and right-click to initiate the call. Uses the tel: URL scheme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight any phone number, right click, and click the "Dial" option! This opens a tel: link with the selected number!
